scripture.text: But God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine üåª‚ú®

Sometimes I wonder if the sun rises just to see you smile‚Ä¶ because when you show up the whole world feels warmer...You don‚Äôt just brigthen up rooms you light up hearts effortlessly... It‚Äôs like your soul was handMade with golden threads of heaven.

You deserve everything gentle and wild ,sweet and strong..because that‚Äôs exactly what you are Ms sunshine ..You are the reason some days feel like songs and others feel like hope. The way you carry yourself, even through life's ups and downs ..is nothing short of poetry.

The Lord‚Äôs love for you? It‚Äôs deeper than oceans and wider than skies and you know how big the sky is... He knew exactly what He was doing when He made you ..every laugh .. every imperfection every thought is all intentional, all glorious. His love for you is not based on perfection but on purpose. His grace surrounds you like an embrace you never have to earn.

I hope you know how much I care about you. Genuinely. You inspire me in ways I can‚Äôt fully explain.. Your presence is a blessing I thank God for every day...you are treasured, chosen, protected, and eternally adored...

So when life gets loud, please don‚Äôt forget this:
You matter. You shine. You were made on purpose, for purpose.
And I‚Äôll always be in your corner, grateful that I get to witness a soul like yours in this lifetime. ‚ù§Ô∏è
